messages.subject: any Unschoolers who are East coast Scuba divers out there?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, Ds is 16 and Certified PADI and I would love to hook him up with a diving family/individual on the East coast. DH and I are also certified, but it is
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

Ds is 16 and Certified PADI and I would love to hook him up with a diving family/individual on the East coast.
DH and I are also certified, but it is not something that we can up and do very often, especially with 2 younger siblings in the house. I have considered the local shops and making contacts there, but wanted to try this resource first.


Thanks,

Beth in MD

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
